reviews.text: What‚Äôs funny is that I ordered from Amici for the first time cause they had a New Jersey Devils pizza. The quality, freshness and deliciousness got me hooked. There is no better pizza in this area. The sauce on the pizza is literally addicting and the dough is mouth watering. Their wings are massive and delicious as well as their cheesesteaks and other subs. This is my go to pizza spot, especially during the hockey season. Doesn‚Äôt hurt that the owners are absolutely fantastic people too. Highly recommend to check out, especially if you are a NJ Devils fan.

The food was all very tasty - I got the drunken meatballs and the vodka sauce was delicious. My husband and friends got various pizzas/slices and everyone really enjoyed their meals. The best part for my 3 year old son Paulie was getting to meet Anthony and watch him make all the pizzas! He was so kind and patient and truly made his day. Thank you for having us!!!

Amazing pizza, We have gotten multiple pies and all have been great. The veggie ones are full of freshly cut veggies, we have 2 vegan friends and they love Amici. Today I got a grilled chicken garden salad with oil and vinegar. Nothing here disappoints. Highly recommended.

If you‚Äôre looking for an authentic New Jersey pizza experience, look no further. From the moment you walk through the door, you‚Äôre hit with that irresistible aroma of fresh dough, bubbling cheese, and perfectly balanced tomato sauce, the kind of smell that instantly takes you back to childhood pizza nights.

The crust here is exactly what a Jersey pie should be: crispy on the outside, chewy on the inside, with just the right "bubbles" by the crust's edge. The sauce is bright, flavorful, and seasoned just right: not too sweet, not too tangy, and of course, fresh basil.  The cheese? Melted to perfection with those little golden brown spots that pizza lovers dream about.

Our go to is "The Bees Knees" pie, which has pepperoni, hot honey, and ricotta.  We also get a plain pie (cheese) each time we order, not just for the kids, also for snack slices over the next couple of days

The place is family owned and operated by some of the best people I know.  You can taste the love and generations of knowledge & skill that goes into the food.

Great people, amazing food, and NJ Devils fans to boot. This place is a local staple and Garden State gem.  Thanks Amicis!!!!

The cutest little restaurant where you are welcome with a warm greeting and a smile, really making it feel like home!

All the sauces are scratch made, and you can really tell, the vodka sauce is my favorite! It‚Äôs fantastic on this gigantic garlic slider that they make, with real garlic butter none of that fake stuff! And the vodka sauce? Out of this world!

You can get slices but getting a whole pie is the way to go! And if you want a more elevated experience, they have a dining room complete with artwork and lighting. And if you want a cute appetizer to start get the fried gnocchi!

recentReviews.text:
You don't go to Amici Pizzeria for The view. You go for the best damn Jersey pizza. Started with a standard pepperoni which was perfect; the crust, the sauce, the pepperoni, perfect.
Second slice was white pizza with ricotta and it was sublime. When hitting Sandy Hook, before or after or before AND after, treat yourself to Amici.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
During our trip to New Jersey, my mom and I decided to try Amici‚Äôs, and I can honestly say it was one of the best decisions we made. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with such warmth and friendliness from the owner it immediately felt like a place where everyone is welcome, not just a pizza shop. We mentioned how we were from Scranton, PA.  That kind of energy makes the food taste even better, but trust me when I say the pizza speaks for itself.
Now, I have to explain something: I‚Äôve never really been a ‚Äúpizza person.‚Äù In fact, I didn‚Äôt even start eating pizza until about 8 years ago, and even then, I‚Äôve only found a couple of places where I actually enjoy it. So when I tell you that Amici‚Äôs is on a whole other level, I mean it. The crust was perfectly baked, the sauce had the right balance of flavor, and the cheese just melted in your mouth. Every bite felt like it was made with love. My mom is a big pizza lover, and even she said it was the BEST pizza she‚Äôs ever had in her life and for her to say that means everything.
What makes Amici‚Äôs stand out isn‚Äôt just the food, though. It‚Äôs the whole experience. The owner didn‚Äôt treat us like customers; he treated us like family. That genuine, welcoming spirit is rare to find these days, and it made us feel right at home.
I never thought I would find a place where I could say, ‚ÄúI LOVE this pizza,‚Äù but Amici‚Äôs has truly changed that for me. This is the SPOT. Every time I come back to Jersey, it‚Äôs going to be my first stop without question. If you‚Äôre in the area and want pizza that will leave you talking about it long after your last bite, do yourself a favor and stop here. You won‚Äôt regret it.
Highly, highly recommend! My mouth is watering just thinking of it right now ü•≤

Amici has great food and service!  They have pizza, wings, cheesesteaks, entrees and even catering.  It's the perfect place for dinner (and BYOB) or a quick slice.  The staff is always friendly and they always go above and beyond to make their customers happy.

What‚Äôs funny is that I ordered from Amici for the first time cause they had a New Jersey Devils pizza. The quality, freshness and deliciousness got me hooked. There is no better pizza in this area. The sauce on the pizza is literally addicting and the dough is mouth watering. Their wings are massive and delicious as well as their cheesesteaks and other subs. This is my go to pizza spot, especially during the hockey season. Doesn‚Äôt hurt that the owners are absolutely fantastic people too. Highly recommend to check out, especially if you are a NJ Devils fan.

The food was all very tasty - I got the drunken meatballs and the vodka sauce was delicious. My husband and friends got various pizzas/slices and everyone really enjoyed their meals. The best part for my 3 year old son Paulie was getting to meet Anthony and watch him make all the pizzas! He was so kind and patient and truly made his day. Thank you for having us!!!
Our family LOVES amici pizza! Not only is the food delicious but such a family centered restaurant. We‚Äôre so lucky they‚Äôre so close and ordering online is a breeze!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Polak
detailedReviews.text:
You don't go to Amici Pizzeria for The view. You go for the best damn Jersey pizza. Started with a standard pepperoni which was perfect; the crust, the sauce, the pepperoni, perfect.
Second slice was white pizza with ricotta and it was sublime. When hitting Sandy Hook, before or after or before AND after, treat yourself to Amici.

detailedReviews.text:

detailedReviews.author: Melanie Fabbri
detailedReviews.text: Amici has great food and service!  They have pizza, wings, cheesesteaks, entrees and even catering.  It's the perfect place for dinner (and BYOB) or a quick slice.  The staff is always friendly and they always go above and beyond to make their customers happy.

detailedReviews.author: Larissa Calamari
detailedReviews.text: What‚Äôs funny is that I ordered from Amici for the first time cause they had a New Jersey Devils pizza. The quality, freshness and deliciousness got me hooked. There is no better pizza in this area. The sauce on the pizza is literally addicting and the dough is mouth watering. Their wings are massive and delicious as well as their cheesesteaks and other subs. This is my go to pizza spot, especially during the hockey season. Doesn‚Äôt hurt that the owners are absolutely fantastic people too. Highly recommend to check out, especially if you are a NJ Devils fan.

detailedReviews.author: Courtney Kelly
detailedReviews.text: The food was all very tasty - I got the drunken meatballs and the vodka sauce was delicious. My husband and friends got various pizzas/slices and everyone really enjoyed their meals. The best part for my 3 year old son Paulie was getting to meet Anthony and watch him make all the pizzas! He was so kind and patient and truly made his day. Thank you for having us!!!

detailedReviews.author: D C
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent food ü•ò
Love it

detailedReviews.author: Elissa Rosedale
detailedReviews.text: Our family LOVES amici pizza! Not only is the food delicious but such a family centered restaurant. We‚Äôre so lucky they‚Äôre so close and ordering online is a breeze!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin
detailedReviews.text: Very horrible experience. Ordered few pizzas and even after 1 hour they haven‚Äôt even placed the order. This is after checking on the status of the order every 20 mins with them and they saying it‚Äôs in the oven. Kept the whole family waiting . After 1 hour 15 mins got the pizzas. So if you are planning to order pls ask if they will give the order on time. After all this the reason was they missed the order and there were lot of orders. But the people who came after half an hour after us got their order and even left.

detailedReviews.author: Jillian Finn
detailedReviews.text: Great food!!

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Verange
detailedReviews.text: We ordered out, it was our first time eating there! They delivered quickly! Everything was amazing and delicious! Thank you so much!

detailedReviews.author: Henry
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and food! Melanie and Anthony are the best! Always friendly and welcoming! Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Ken Keene
detailedReviews.text:
If you‚Äôre looking for an authentic New Jersey pizza experience, look no further. From the moment you walk through the door, you‚Äôre hit with that irresistible aroma of fresh dough, bubbling cheese, and perfectly balanced tomato sauce, the kind of smell that instantly takes you back to childhood pizza nights.

The crust here is exactly what a Jersey pie should be: crispy on the outside, chewy on the inside, with just the right "bubbles" by the crust's edge. The sauce is bright, flavorful, and seasoned just right: not too sweet, not too tangy, and of course, fresh basil.  The cheese? Melted to perfection with those little golden brown spots that pizza lovers dream about.

Our go to is "The Bees Knees" pie, which has pepperoni, hot honey, and ricotta.  We also get a plain pie (cheese) each time we order, not just for the kids, also for snack slices over the next couple of days

The place is family owned and operated by some of the best people I know.  You can taste the love and generations of knowledge & skill that goes into the food.

Great people, amazing food, and NJ Devils fans to boot. This place is a local staple and Garden State gem.  Thanks Amicis!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Evan Blechman
detailedReviews.text: Genuinely one of the greatest pizza places in NJ, everyone who works there is beyond friendly and willing to accommodate customer orders. Their bianca (white) and sicilian pizzas in particular are incredible. If you live anywhere in monmouth it's worth it to stop in even just to become familiar with this place.

detailedReviews.author: Karen Sacerdote
detailedReviews.text: I had an order delivered to a wrong address. I called the restaurant and they immediately sent out a whole new order to the correct address. The staff is so understanding and amazing. I highly recommend them!

detailedReviews.author: Mary Jane
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Jersey!  Everyone who visits us from out of town always has Amici on their ‚Äúmust have‚Äù while visiting list! Family run business and great atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Altinay Cortes
detailedReviews.text: The Sicilian is hefty but still light and airy. It was delicious! The staff was friendly and the pizza and fries were very tasty.

detailedReviews.author: chooxchoo732
detailedReviews.text: Got the ‚ÄúJohn wrap‚Äù. Was amazing. Had a slice while I was waiting for my order as well, which was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Dannielle Wolf
detailedReviews.text: Every order from Amici‚Äôs is always delicious, and the people are always friendly and helpful. my favorite pizza place in the area! Their bees knees pizza is my favorite, and their wings are AMAZING!!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Garramone
detailedReviews.text:
The day I found Amici‚Äôs pizza was the day all other pizzas died cause no one makes pizza like Amicis it has the best taste!!! The antipasto salad is the best the meatballs are the best tasting I moved from living close to them but I still drive to get Amici‚Äôs I will not settle for any pizza it has to be Amicis
I think you should try it I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll love them I always order a med.pepperoni pizza antipasto salad and side of meatballs  I‚Äôm in heaven for the night thank you AMICIS!!

detailedReviews.author: John Magda
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Struse
detailedReviews.text: Love Amici‚Äôs. Great food, reasonable prices

detailedReviews.author: Michele Ricciardi
detailedReviews.text: We decided to have Amici Pizzeria host a surprise party for my mom and sister. The owners Mel and Anthony were accommodating and willing to help us make everything perfect and exactly what we envisioned. We decided to rent out the whole restaurant and it worked out well for the amount of people we had attending. The catering menu was all your Italian classics with their own little spin on some. The antipasto cups and chicken parm sliders were a favorite among the passed appetizers and the bolognese and penne vodka were to die for.

detailedReviews.author: Alexandra Doomany
detailedReviews.text: The bees knees is my favorite, always really great customer service, which makes such a meaningful difference in a sea of pizzerias.

detailedReviews.author: Charles Larue
detailedReviews.text: My son just said it was the best chicken francaise ever and the grilled chicken was delicious and a great amount after the gym!! Highly recommend supporting !!!

detailedReviews.author: MyOnline Financials
detailedReviews.text: Just had a slice of margarita. Best in area. Fantastic service as well. So polite and professional.  Will be back to try other dishes with an empty stomach.

detailedReviews.author: Samantha Amorim
detailedReviews.text: My regular pizza spot. I get the hot honey pie - so good every time.

detailedReviews.author: Cosme Quiroz Quiroz
detailedReviews.text: Terrible service, in this place they don't know how to make food, this is the second time I've been through this, to make a chiken caesar wrap it took half an hour, the wrap it was all lettuce, the guy told me they only had whole wead tortilla , and he gave me another type of tortilla, the wrap came with some prepackaged potatoes, be sure to check the review of the place before placing your orders...üëéüëéüëé

detailedReviews.author: SEAFARER
detailedReviews.text: We LOVE Amicci! Great pizza! Great people!!

detailedReviews.author: Toby Stark
detailedReviews.text: Really great place to take the family in a great part of NJ!

detailedReviews.author: Downtown Pump
detailedReviews.text:
ANTHONY AND MELANIE ARE ABSOLUTELY THE Best. Food is lights out awesome and they are great hosts. The wings are on a different level. LOVE THEM AND THE FOOD.
Junglejimandjane

detailedReviews.author: The NVP Show
detailedReviews.text: I got to know the owners through interviewing one of them through my New Jersey Devils podcast.  I went in with a friend to try the New Jersey Devils pie and it was fantastic!  It looked super cool, the sauce was great and pie overall was tremendous!  Loved getting to know the people there and I'm excited to come back asap!

detailedReviews.author: Julia Smith
detailedReviews.text: My brother and I love coming here, so delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Harsh Easwar
detailedReviews.text: Firstly, the food was amazing. Secondly, they were very lovely. I've never done a rating before but after my experience I was like I have to write one. I came by myself so I was slightly scared as I usually don't go to restaurants alone but they were so kind and they made me feel like I was part of the family. I didn't end up staying too long as I had to go but I also saw how they treated other customers and how other customers felt very comfortable. Not many places are like this nowadays so definitely go check it out. It's a W place

detailedReviews.author: Michele S
detailedReviews.text: Highly recommend.  The food is delicious and you get so much for what it costs. The chicken parm and calzones are each enough to share and we still had enough for the next day.

detailedReviews.author: Stevenson Almonte
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza, We have gotten multiple pies and all have been great. The veggie ones are full of freshly cut veggies, we have 2 vegan friends and they love Amici. Today I got a grilled chicken garden salad with oil and vinegar. Nothing here disappoints. Highly recommended.

detailedReviews.author: Bev Maloney
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is really good, "personal, thin crust plain" is probably one of the best I've ever had!  And the meatballs and house sauce...why would I ever try to make them myself!?  They're magic!!  If you're visiting the area now during the summer, don't miss out.  If you live around here and have never tried this place, you're missing out!!  PS, I'm just a customer...I don't own the place, not related to them (although they're really nice people), just try it...you won't be sorry!!

detailedReviews.author: Jack Robinson
detailedReviews.text: Meatball pizza is great, service is great

detailedReviews.author: Lindsey Alexandria
detailedReviews.text: I got a chance to sample a slice of their white pizza at the Jersey Eats NJ Pizza Festival. The slice was the first one I had and yet it is still one of the most memorable for me. The crust was crispy yet soft and unbelievable - no flop! The pizza was savory and had the perfect dollops of ricotta. The cheese wasn't slopping off, everything stayed together nicely. It even had a unique crust that had "everything but the bagel" seasoning encrusted on top. I normally don't go for a white pizza but seeing this at first glance I just felt gravitated to try it and I'm glad I did! This is a great family operated pizzeria. The family is super kind and proud of their business which I took away in the few moments I interacted with them at the festival. I wish them all the best and hope to stop by for some more of their pizza if I'm ever in the area! I recommend you try them!

detailedReviews.author: Nelson Montalvo
detailedReviews.text: Awesome üëå

detailedReviews.author: Amelia
detailedReviews.text: Melanie, the owner of this adorable restuarant, was a pleasure to work with in the planning of my rune event.  The space in the back was inviting, secluded, and so nicely decorated.  As if that weren't enough, the food was delciously authentic and my guests really enjoyed the BYOB option.  I will definetly host future events here and encourage others to check it out!

detailedReviews.author: Ivy colon
detailedReviews.text:
The cutest little restaurant where you are welcome with a warm greeting and a smile, really making it feel like home!

All the sauces are scratch made, and you can really tell, the vodka sauce is my favorite! It‚Äôs fantastic on this gigantic garlic slider that they make, with real garlic butter none of that fake stuff! And the vodka sauce? Out of this world!

You can get slices but getting a whole pie is the way to go! And if you want a more elevated experience, they have a dining room complete with artwork and lighting. And if you want a cute appetizer to start get the fried gnocchi!

detailedReviews.author: jason witkowski
detailedReviews.text: Had a pizza party for my 4yo here.  The pizza was outstanding! Especially the margherita.  Staff was great and place is very family friendly. It's family owned and operated and it shows in the best ways.  Would definitely return.

detailedReviews.author: Mandy Gallopo
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food, amazing staff! Grilled chicken with fresh mozzarella & balsamic is my fav! Def worth trying!!

detailedReviews.author: Adrian Moreira
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I‚Äôve had so far!  thin crust,  nice crunch can‚Äôt go wrong nothing compares to them!

detailedReviews.author: Dillon Lee
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered takeout over the phone on a Sunday afternoon around 4:45pm. Quick and easy. When I picked up, order was all correct.
(Large margherita pie. Large buffalo wings with Bleu cheese. Penne vodka with chicken)

Easy drive to get here (right off route 36)
Plenty of parking spots. They are a part of a small strip mall that includes a sushi spot, gym, dollar store, nail salon etc so parking is never an issue.

Wings were the crispy and just the right amount of sauce. Pizza was perfect, melty cheese with the thin crust that was in between soft and firm.
Pasta was huge.. it was packed full with chicken. Needed a little salt though.

Hands down the best pizza for the price around the area.
They also have a loyalty program. Just add your phone number and after you spend $100, you'll get 10% off your next order.

detailedReviews.author: Tiffany Terefenko
detailedReviews.text: So delicious, a must try!!

detailedReviews.author: Jimmy Judge
detailedReviews.text: Great food, great service.

detailedReviews.author: David Weiner
detailedReviews.text: Had the sausage pizza, best I have had in a long time.  You can actually taste all tge herbs and seasoning in their sauce because their is just the right balance a cheese, sauce and great crust!!!

detailedReviews.author: Fred Bruno
detailedReviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but the vegetable calzone that they made for me was fantastic.  Many places treat a vegetable calzone like a chore.  Some places care so little they just put onion in it, nothing else.  Amici doesn't.  It had eggplant, onion, broccoli, garlic, spinach and peppers.  They called it a walking through the garden calzone.  Definitely worth it.

detailedReviews.author: Jack Kelleher
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza i've ever had. Very friendly staff, and a great place to talk calcio! Stop by every time i'm in NJ

detailedReviews.author: joseph saponaro
detailedReviews.text:
This spot is the best kept secret in Monmouth county!
Delicious pizza and amazing Italian food.
I just had them do all my catering for my holiday party & everyone kept asking where the food was from.
Thank you Amici!!

detailedReviews.author: Heat
detailedReviews.text: Great food! Awesome staff! Crust super and light and sauce has amazing flavor

detailedReviews.author: Kristina McLeod
detailedReviews.text: Got the vodka chicken parm pizza & fried gnocchi, absolutely delicious! Fresh and tasty

detailedReviews.author: Bex
detailedReviews.text: Stopped in to grab 2 margherita slices after a doctor‚Äôs appointment in the same strip mall. Not only was the pie fresh out of the oven but it was absolutely delicious. Oh, and let‚Äôs go Devils üëπ

detailedReviews.author: Night Train
detailedReviews.text: I tried Amicci‚Äôs  since Pomodoro‚Äôs could never seem to make a pizza when they say they will or properly take an order. So glad I switched. They will make a pizza anyway, you want here and on time.

detailedReviews.author: William Cost
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza and clean inside

detailedReviews.author: Joe
detailedReviews.text: Cheese and sauce taste of a low quality. Crust was burnt. Very nice staff.

detailedReviews.author: Anthony
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza, wraps and sandwiches.  My son and I have a painting business and we try alot of pizza around the state.  This establishment does it right. We have had the regular pie, margarita pie, grilled chicken pesto wrap, the godfather cheese steak and the buffalo chicken wrap.  All great.  We'll enjoy lunch there until our current job is complete.  The Tony's and counter person are all wonderful.

detailedReviews.author: Pete Walton
detailedReviews.text: Not just a pizzeria -- sit in the dining room for a tasty meal featuring delicious baked bread and fresh, ample salads. For takeout, try the deep fried calzones!

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Vitale
detailedReviews.text: We love Amici! The food is excellent‚Äî great pizza, wraps, salads, and pastas. Yesterday, I held my daughter‚Äôs birthday party in the back room and everything was amazing. Melanie is my new favorite person‚Äî she was so accommodating, so on top of every detail, so warm and friendly, and made it a 5 star day. The party room is beautiful and the food was delicious. Can‚Äôt say enough great things about this wonderful family business. Thank you, Amici!

detailedReviews.author: Katharina W.
detailedReviews.text: We tried Amici for the first time tonight and ordered a grandma pie. It was absolutely delicious. Definitely our new place to order from.

detailedReviews.author: Colin Kelly
detailedReviews.text: Overpriced slice which is small looks like it's been sitting for 2 days won't be returning first time customer also the girl at the counter gave me the smallest slice possible out of that pie either that or they're all tiny and not worth the price

detailedReviews.author: Harlea Maria
detailedReviews.text: Really good pie, I do wish it was not crisp on the bottom but no biggie I still ate the whole thing. Everyone was fast and friendly. I recommend going here, I know I'll be coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Jairo Bautista
detailedReviews.text: Man hands-down the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life, specially coming from philly were it seems u can‚Äôt find good pizza üçï

detailedReviews.author: Chicken McNuggets
detailedReviews.text: I recently visited Amici pizzeria and  I absolutely loved it! The crust was perfectly crispy and the toppings were so fresh. The atmosphere was also great and the staff was friendly. I highly recommend this place!

detailedReviews.author: Expedito Mendez
detailedReviews.text: M gustoüëçüëçüëç

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Trabolse
detailedReviews.text: I cannot say enough about this establishment! Not only are the owners beyond hospitable, but the food talks for itself. We decided to throw my son‚Äôs 4th birthday here and the laughs and happiness and filling of belly‚Äôs that went, was worth while! All I can say is go try and see for yourself - you won‚Äôt be disappointed!

detailedReviews.author: Dan Tishman
detailedReviews.text: Everything is homemade using top quality products but the taste and joy of eating there makes the end result one you'll only find in a family run business with generations backing them up! Yummy!

detailedReviews.author: Colleen Banzaca
detailedReviews.text: Was there for a sip and paint great time

detailedReviews.author: john conlin
detailedReviews.text:
Amazing pizza amazing staff
And thank you supporting our US Veterans

detailedReviews.author: J M
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza, great service

detailedReviews.author: Peter Lukianov
detailedReviews.text: I work in door to door sales and one of my favorite things to do is to try a new pizza place wherever I go. I‚Äôve eaten at 120+ pizzerias in the central Jersey area in the last six months. This place is EASILY in the top 3. Amazing pizza and very friendly owners and staff. These guys even have a pizza where the crust is like an everything bagel ü§Øü§Øü§Ø

detailedReviews.author: Leslie Tiras
detailedReviews.text: I know times are tough and food is expensive but I got home and my pizza slice had 3 pieces of pepperoni . My pasta was a huge mass of noodles stuck together with very little dry meat sauce. Very nice kids work there but I will not go back.

detailedReviews.author: James Walsh
detailedReviews.text: I tried the drunkin dish with pena vodka very dry  no vodka sauce disapointed

detailedReviews.author: Walid Ahmady
detailedReviews.text: I had to go to Atlantic highlands for some work and decided to stop by for lunch at amici‚Äôs off of Route 36 and gotta say this place was great. Not only was the cashier/counter lady very nice and attentive but the pizza was great too. I got a plain slice and maugherita slice and both were fantastic along with a fountain Pepsi. I‚Äôll definitely be coming back here again soon

detailedReviews.author: Mr. B
detailedReviews.text: Pizza it self was decent however the service was a bit confusing haha but overall not a bad pizza joint :)

detailedReviews.author: Sean Koch
detailedReviews.text: Great food, friendly staff, warm ambiance.  Well priced, nice decor.

detailedReviews.author: KK
detailedReviews.text: Really great food, well priced.  Nice decor.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Amici Pizzeria offers an authentic New Jersey pizza experience with perfectly baked crust, balanced sauce, and melted cheese that leaves customers talking long after their last bite. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The warm and welcoming atmosphere at Amici Pizzeria, where the owner treats customers like family, creates a memorable dining experience that keeps patrons coming back. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

Amici Pizzeria's menu variety, including standout items like the "Bees Knees" pie and massive, delicious wings, caters to diverse tastes and keeps customers returning for more. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and order mishandling - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews about food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Perception of high prices and small portion sizes - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Chris Polak
positive.text:
You don't go to Amici Pizzeria for The view. You go for the best damn Jersey pizza. Started with a standard pepperoni which was perfect; the crust, the sauce, the pepperoni, perfect.
Second slice was white pizza with ricotta and it was sublime. When hitting Sandy Hook, before or after or before AND after, treat yourself to Amici.

positive.author: Brooke Harashinski
positive.text:
‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
During our trip to New Jersey, my mom and I decided to try Amici‚Äôs, and I can honestly say it was one of the best decisions we made. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with such warmth and friendliness from the owner it immediately felt like a place where everyone is welcome, not just a pizza shop. We mentioned how we were from Scranton, PA.  That kind of energy makes the food taste even better, but trust me when I say the pizza speaks for itself.
Now, I have to explain something: I‚Äôve never really been a ‚Äúpizza person.‚Äù In fact, I didn‚Äôt even start eating pizza until about 8 years ago, and even then, I‚Äôve only found a couple of places where I actually enjoy it. So when I tell you that Amici‚Äôs is on a whole other level, I mean it. The crust was perfectly baked, the sauce had the right balance of flavor, and the cheese just melted in your mouth. Every bite felt like it was made with love. My mom is a big pizza lover, and even she said it was the BEST pizza she‚Äôs ever had in her life and for her to say that means everything.
What makes Amici‚Äôs stand out isn‚Äôt just the food, though. It‚Äôs the whole experience. The owner didn‚Äôt treat us like customers; he treated us like family. That genuine, welcoming spirit is rare to find these days, and it made us feel right at home.
I never thought I would find a place where I could say, ‚ÄúI LOVE this pizza,‚Äù but Amici‚Äôs has truly changed that for me. This is the SPOT. Every time I come back to Jersey, it‚Äôs going to be my first stop without question. If you‚Äôre in the area and want pizza that will leave you talking about it long after your last bite, do yourself a favor and stop here. You won‚Äôt regret it.
Highly, highly recommend! My mouth is watering just thinking of it right now ü•≤

negative.author: Kevin
negative.text: Very horrible experience. Ordered few pizzas and even after 1 hour they haven‚Äôt even placed the order. This is after checking on the status of the order every 20 mins with them and they saying it‚Äôs in the oven. Kept the whole family waiting . After 1 hour 15 mins got the pizzas. So if you are planning to order pls ask if they will give the order on time. After all this the reason was they missed the order and there were lot of orders. But the people who came after half an hour after us got their order and even left.

negative.author: Cosme Quiroz Quiroz
negative.text: Terrible service, in this place they don't know how to make food, this is the second time I've been through this, to make a chiken caesar wrap it took half an hour, the wrap it was all lettuce, the guy told me they only had whole wead tortilla , and he gave me another type of tortilla, the wrap came with some prepackaged potatoes, be sure to check the review of the place before placing your orders...üëéüëéüëé
